short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI for job search, application and submission

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the extension to help connect Aura AI account with job sites' account starting out with LinkedIn account. By connecting the accounts, we can help users search for job and apply for jobs automatically using their account.
